body_html: @dmitryb-ai2 @mrastegari It will be a great progress if the XNORNets can be implemented by a fast C++ for Intel and ARM CPUs, especially getting 58× faster convolutional operations and 32× memory savings as mentioned in the paper. But, sadly, I can't code it. So looking forward to your good news!
